chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance d1 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 -> pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1 -> pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1)

Premises:
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
ad = N : Set
List.tl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
pl_path_product = fix pl_path_product (p0 p1 : pl_path) {struct p1} : pl_path := match p0 with | pl_path_nil => match p1 with | pl_path_nil | _ => pl_path_nil end | pl_path_cons a0 b0 => match p1 with | pl_path_nil => pl_path_nil | pl_path_cons a1 b1 => pl_path_cons (iad_conv a0 a1) (pl_path_product b0 b1) end end : pl_path -> pl_path -> pl_path
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA ->
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
predta_produit_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
predta_produit_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) a = Some s -> exists (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), a = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 /\ MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
indprinciple_term : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, P t
indprinciple_3_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : term -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t
indprinciple_3_aux = fun n : nat => forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pl_produit_path_incl_2 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_0 = fun (_ : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty) (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat) (H0 : pl_path_recon d tl pl_path_nil) (_ : pl_tl_length prec_empty n) => let H2 : d = d -> tl = tl -> pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := match H0 in (pl_path_recon p t p0) return (p = d -> t = tl -> p0 = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl) with | pl_path_rec_nil d0 => fun (H2 : d0 = d) (H3 : tnil = tl) (H4 : pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil) => (fun H5 : d0 = d => let H6 :...
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
pl_produit_path_incl_1 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1)
pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
term_occur_def_1 = fun t : term_list => forall u : term, term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t : term_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
predta_produit_4_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a1 = Some s2 : preDTA -> Prop
predta_produit_3_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a1 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a2 = Some s2 : preDTA -> Prop
predta_produit_3 : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a1 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a2 = Some s2
predta_produit_4 : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a1 = Some s2
term_occur_def_0 = fun t : term => forall u : term, term_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high t : term -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_produit_path_incl_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t

```coq
intros tl H.
induction tl as [|t tl'].
- intros d0 d1 plp0 plp1 Hcomp Hrecon0 Hrecon1.
  constructor.
  apply pl_path_rec_equiv_1_0 with (H0:=Hrecon0) (n:=0).
  auto.
- intros d0 d1 plp0 plp1 Hcomp Hrecon0 Hrecon1.
  destruct t as [a tl].
  destruct plp0 as [|a0 plp0].
  destruct plp1 as [|a1 plp1].
  constructor.
  apply reconnaissance_compat with (d0:=d0) (d1:=d1) (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (t:=tl).
  + apply predta_compatible_compat.
    apply Hcomp.
  + apply H.
    intros u Hoccur.
    apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur.
    apply Hoccur.
  + apply IHtl'.
    * intros u Hoccur.
      apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur.
      apply Hoccur.
    * apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a:=a0) (t:=tl) (plp:=plp0).
      apply reconnaissance_compat with (d0:=d0) (d1:=d1) (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (t:=tl).
      - apply predta_compatible_compat.
        apply Hcomp.
      - apply H.
        intros u Hoccur.
        apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur.
        apply Hoccur.
      - apply IHtl'.
        intros u Hoccur.
        apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur.
        apply Hoccur.
    * apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a:=a1) (t:=tl) (plp:=plp1).
      apply reconnaissance_compat with (d0:=d0) (d1:=d1) (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (t:=tl).
      - apply predta_compatible_compat.
        apply Hcomp.
      - apply H.
        intros u Hoccur.
        apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur.
        apply Hoccur.
      - apply IHtl'.
        intros u Hoccur.
        apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur.
        apply Hoccur.
Qed.

original: intros tl H. induction tl as [|t tl']. - intros d0 d1 plp0 plp1 Hcomp Hrecon0 Hrecon1. constructor. apply pl_path_rec_equiv_1_0 with (H0:=Hrecon0) (n:=0). auto. - intros d0 d1 plp0 plp1 Hcomp Hrecon0 Hrecon1. destruct t as [a tl]. destruct plp0 as [|a0 plp0]. destruct plp1 as [|a1 plp1]. constructor. apply reconnaissance_compat with (d0:=d0) (d1:=d1) (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (t:=tl). + apply predta_compatible_compat. apply Hcomp. + apply H. intros u Hoccur. apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur. apply Hoccur. + apply IHtl'. * intros u Hoccur. apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur. apply Hoccur. * apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a:=a0) (t:=tl) (plp:=plp0). apply reconnaissance_compat with (d0:=d0) (d1:=d1) (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (t:=tl). - apply predta_compatible_compat. apply Hcomp. - apply H. intros u Hoccur. apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur. apply Hoccur. - apply IHtl'. intros u Hoccur. apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur. apply Hoccur. * apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a:=a1) (t:=tl) (plp:=plp1). apply reconnaissance_compat with (d0:=d0) (d1:=d1) (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (t:=tl). - apply predta_compatible_compat. apply Hcomp. - apply H. intros u Hoccur. apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur. apply Hoccur. - apply IHtl'. intros u Hoccur. apply term_occur_def_1 in Hoccur. apply Hoccur.
